parameters.name: Members
parameters.description: The information about the users to be added.

parameters.name: ObjectId
parameters.description:
The ID of the object.

*   If the object is a workspace, you can call the [GetLhSpaceByName](~~424379~~) operation to obtain the workspace ID.
*   If the object is a task flow, you can call the [ListLhTaskFlowAndScenario](~~426672~~) operation to obtain the task flow ID.

parameters.name: ObjectType
parameters.description:
The type of the object. Valid values:

*   **0**: workspace
*   **1**: task flow

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.
